original_title: The donut, the balloon and the lifesaver
overview: An atypical Thanksgiving comedy from the mind of Banks Helfrich Pre-adolescent aspiring writer gets stuck spending Thanksgiving with his idiosyncratic leaf blower-loving father, donut-consuming mother and repetitive aunts and uncles. His only refuge is the bumper sticker-creating cousin he understands and his pad and pencil.
title: The donut, the balloon and the lifesaver
